node.excerpt: In his seminal paper "An Essay towards solving a Problem in the Doctrine of Chances", Thomas Bayes introduced a thought experiment involving six balls thrown randomly onto a billiards table.

frontmatter.title: Bayesian billiards
frontmatter.author: Tom
frontmatter.excerpt: In his seminal paper "An Essay towards solving a Problem in the Doctrine of Chances", Thomas Bayes introduced a thought experiment involving six balls thrown randomly onto a billiards table.
